name: 𝕗𝕠𝕣 𝕥𝕙𝕖 𝕝𝕠𝕧𝕖 𝕠𝕗 懐♥か♥し♥さ!
name_original: 𝕗𝕠𝕣 𝕥𝕙𝕖 𝕝𝕠𝕧𝕖 𝕠𝕗 懐♥か♥し♥さ!
description:
𝕗𝕠𝕣 𝕥𝕙𝕖 𝕝𝕠𝕧𝕖 𝕠𝕗 懐♥か♥し♥さ!

Objective: Throw Items into the room with particles coming out of it.

Controls
W/A/S/D/Space to Move
‘E’ to Pick Up Items
Click Mouse to Throw Item
Shift to Run
